full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` PADMA DBANG CHEN GYI DBANG CHU MA DAG PA'I DRI MA 'KHRUD BYED BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,('DI LTAR DBANG GI CHU BO 'DI NI SLOB DPON PADMA'I DBANG BYANG DANG, DPAL LDAN GRUB THOB KUN MKHYEN PA SOGS KYI GZHUNG DANG MAN NGAG TSAD MAR BZHAG CING, MTHONG BA RGYUD PA DANG LDAN PA TSUL BZHIN DU MDOR BSDUS 'DI TSUL DU BKOD PA 'DI YANG SLOB MA RNAMS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG, DBUS STON PA LA SOGS PA 'GA' RES GSAR MA'I RGYAS BTAB NAS, CHU COR PAn, RDO RJE DRIL BU, MI DBANG SOGS BRGYUD PA'I MAN NGAG DANG, @011B GZHU MED PA BYED PA SPANGS, GNAS RANG LUGS MA DKRUGS SHING GZHAN LUGS MA BSRES PAR GZHAN PHAN GYI BLOS BRIS PA 'DI SKYON MED PAR BSAM NAS, GSAR RNYING RGYUD SDE GZHAN LA'ANG 'DRIS SHING, KHYAD PAR YANG GSANG LA DA LHA  MKHAS PO SNYAM PA'I RTOGS PA CAN, RVA BAN CHOS DPAL BZANG PO BYA LO ZLA BA BRGYAD PA'I TSE BCO LNGA LA, RGYAL PO'I KHAB KYI SGO MANG CHEN POR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SNGAGS 'DZIN BSHES GNYEN BYA BZANG GIS BGYIS PA'O, ,)
